column5: Got an email from SAIL showing a 20% off storewide sale from November 27th to 30th.  Sounds good to me!   Even the Sasquatch is surprised, lol.   No idea why they chose that.  I couldn't find it on the website though.    OFFER VALID AT THE FOLLOWING STORE LOCATIONS ONLY:BURLINGTON | ETOBICOKE | OSHAWA | VAUGHAN
What is the asterix for? I assume there are things that aren't covered under that, wonder what they are.....
I just picked up a new muskie net on sunday and they had their 15% off sale. I didn't have to fight anyone either. Store was empty!
* Discount applies to regular prices in store only.  Not applicable on Canada Goose, firearms, crossbows & ammunition.  Details in store.  Offer is valid from November 27th to 30th, 2014.  Burt

* Discount applies to regular prices in store only.  Not applicable on Canada Goose, firearms, crossbows & ammunition.  Details in store.  Offer is valid from November 27th to 30th, 2014.  Burt  Thank you.
Sail has the worst web page ever really Mickey Mouse very little product info
Sail has the worst web page ever really Mickey Mouse very little product info Have to agree, it's horrible.
Nothing worse than the BassPro website...... at least the stuff on the Sail website is in CAD!!  Burt

I have to agree, although I love the store, there website is pathetic. ( at least time I was on there). Say what you will about bps website, but I think they got it figured out. They may not convert into Canadian dollars, but at least I can find what I'm looking for.
I aggree about their website but bass pro and cabellas prices are still higher than prices at sail with the 20% off

Umm every been to LeBaron's website LOL. There is a reason they are so much cheaper on tons of the stuff I buy and I think it is because they haven't paid a web designer in about 15 years. If you want to cut and paste you might just be able to cobble together an order to give them your money, but they DO NOT make it easy LOL.
i got the clam nanook for $425 after tax
